widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

description: Hey, Ever Alejandro here. I am 19 years old, and I am from Mexico. I have always been passionate about technology and computers, so I decided to devote myself to programming and to make the world more accessible for everyone.

I'm Ricardo Ochoa. I consider myself a geek who has a great passion for fixing electronics, playing video games, and listening to music! Also, I am an optimistic person who frequently jokes and makes fun of everything, and Iâ€™m always looking at the bright side of life.

Hello everyone, my name is Miguel Bala. I'm 21 years old, born in Acapulco, Guerrero. Currently, I'm studying Software Development and Management. My knowledge is based mainly on back-end development, but I wanted to try the QA area, so here I am. I am very excited to work with all of you. Special thanks to all of the people who made this possible.

Hello everyone! I like to travel, learn about different cultures, and make new friends. I am pleased and motivated to join Justia as part of the Engineering Team. I hope to learn a lot and contribute to the company. I am convinced I will succeed as a professional as I am standing on the shoulders of giants. I wish you all the best!
Hello World! I'm Miguel, a developer from Guanajuato. I enjoy science fiction, music, and learning about everything out there.
